channel.title: Projects on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Terminal

item.title: Pfront
item.description: Interacting with the Polygon API exclusively through curl or Postman can be tedious. For the sake of convenience, I built a frontend client with SvelteKit, in my opinion, the quickest framework to deliver results. Source code.
item.content:
Interacting with the Polygon API exclusively through curl or Postman can be tedious. For the sake of convenience, I built a frontend client with SvelteKit, in my opinion, the quickest framework to deliver results.

Source code.

item.title: Polygon
item.description: WMS (warehouse management system) API built with Golang. It uses Echo as web server, and bun as ORM. Authentication and authorization based on a JSON Web Tokens solution (access-refresh model), full item movements history, CRUD operations. Source code.
item.content:
WMS (warehouse management system) API built with Golang. It uses Echo as web server, and bun as ORM. Authentication and authorization based on a JSON Web Tokens solution (access-refresh model), full item movements history, CRUD operations.

Source code.
